First time offered for sale in 42 years, this is a rare opportunity to capitalise on a generous 736sqm (approx.) corner allotment with GRZ1 zoning in a high exposure location. Set amongst landscaped gardens, this colonial-style home offers space for the whole family to enjoy. The large updated kitchen and casual meals area open to a decked balcony with panoramic views. Description:
An Endearing Family Entertainer
Perfectly designed for the modern family, this stunning residence enjoys prime positioning on an elevated 674sqm (approx.) block with beautiful garden surrounds and views of Ruffey Lake Park.
A welcoming marble-tiled entryway leads into a stylish and comfortable interior blessed with an abundance of natural light and complemented by fresh paint, timber floors, and quality carpets and drapes. The easy flowing living and dining rooms deliver a spacious entertaining zone with the ability to create an open plan or close off as required. So whether you’re wining and dining guests in the lounge, separate dining, or family room (which leads out to an alfresco patio), entertaining here will be a breeze. A granite kitchen equipped with Smeg, Gaggenau and Bosch appliances only adds to the appeal.
Accommodation-wise, four bedrooms are located on the top floor while a versatile fifth bedroom/study option is on the entry level. All feature fitted built-in robes and are serviced by three renovated bathrooms with floor-to-ceiling tiles. The master bedroom is pampered with an ensuite and fitted walk-in robe.
Outdoors, a professionally landscaped garden features hedges, Australian natives and a variety of fruit trees providing year round enjoyment.
Added benefits include refrigerated cooling and ducted heating (upstairs), ducted heating and split system cooling (downstairs), solar panels, ample storage and a remote double garage.
Capping off this wonderful home is the quiet and serene location. Ruffey Lake Park is just metres away while Westfield, Aquarena, public transport and a choice of primary and secondary schools are also nearby.
